title: Did a Catholic Priest Refuse to Give Joe Biden Communion?
subtitle: The Rev. Robert Morey sparked controversy in October 2019 when he said he had denied the eucharist to Biden because he "advocates for abortion."
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In October 2019, the Rev. Robert Morey of St. Anthony's parish in Florence, South Carolina, refused former Vice President Joe Biden the Catholic rite of communion.
